reviewText: I bought one of these DVDs at a Salvation Army Store. I was immediately hooked. The brutality of the conflict, the brotherhood of the vets as soldiers, and the quality of the half century old video, can bring a guy to tears. The tasteful presentation will make any American proud to be just that. I consider myself lucky, at the very least, to be able to own the entire set. God love all you gentlemen and ladies who served during this tumultuous time in our history.
